1: A song of the stairway O God-Enthroned in heaven, I lift my eyes toward you in worship.
2: The way I love you is like the way a servant wants to please his master, the way a maid waits for the orders of her mistress. We look to you, our God, with passionate longing to please you and discover more of your mercy and grace.
3-4: –4 For we've had more than our fill of this scoffing and scorn— this mistreatment by the wealthy elite. Lord, show us your mercy! Lord, show us your grace!
